name: v0.3.8-rc.1
body:
1. [Fix race condition in LifoBlockingLimiter](https://github.com/Netflix/concurrency-limits/commit/0017e8e4c4afa8b55b3af7e2a1c9a1d48f468ca5)
2. [Allow custom HTTP status for throttled requests](https://github.com/Netflix/concurrency-limits/commit/7da4bec8152305ce1b90f5634e32ed54abc2c9ce)
3. [Dependency updates add junit 5 support](https://github.com/Netflix/concurrency-limits/commit/37c622e40babed7a0874029829bda34bdd23c1c5)

#129 metrics: Api cleanup + counters
#130 metrics: Add limiter status (dropped, rejected, success, ignored) metrics

name: v0.2.0
body:
- Default min/max limits for AIMD limiter set at 20/200
- Reduce limit by half when AIMD limiter reaches the max limit

name: v0.1.16
body: Improve gRPC client call rejection by allow other interceptors to get the outgoing request

name: v0.1.15
body: - Improve gRPC client call rejection by allow other interceptors to get the outgoing request

name: v0.1.14
body: Hook into GRPC's Context cancellation as another mechanism to release the inflight count

name: v0.1.13
body: - Ignore streaming APIs for GRPC concurrency limiters

name: v0.1.12
body: Add inflight metric to SimpleLimiter

name: v0.1.10
body:
- Fix limit gauge not updating when using a PartitionedLimiter
- Fix log10 function

Fixed
- #91 Fix invalid timeout for blocking limiter

Changed
- #92 Tweak gradient2 algorithm

### Added
- AIMDLimit now support having a timeout to determine when a drop has occurred.   Default is 5 seconds.

### Changed
- Probe for new noload RTT in VegasLimit as a function of current limit

name: Fix math overflow bug in BlockingLimiter

body:
### Added
- Add an optional timeout to BlockingLimiter, so that users can e.g. block for up to a minute, and then fail. 
- Add optional server side delays when rejecting requests

### Fixed
- Fix a bug in SimpleLimiter - it fails if inflight > maxInflight, but should be >=
- Improve logic around gradient2 measurement reset
- Fix releasing the limit on upstream interceptor failures

### Changed
- Default minimum sample window size from 100 to 10 requests

name: API cleanup + Gradient2
body:
This release has backwards incompatible changes. 

- Simplify the API by merging the Strategy abstraction into Limit
- Introduce new Gradient2 algorithm which fixes long term RTT bias
- Simplify windowing of samples as input to the Limit algorithms

- Add probing to VegasLimit
- Simplify probing configuration
- TCP slow-start like behavior for VegasLimit

- Fix bug filtering sample window for high noload RTT
- Continue using the existing sample window when it fails the filter to avoid starving the algorithm
- Set limit to queueSize when probing for minRtt
-  Add GRPC example

- Better tracking of RTT noLoad
- For the 'gradient' limiter allow for probing for an up to date noload RTT
- Less aggressive min rtt threshold of (1 us) now that we can probe for better RTT
- Make the sample window size relative to the last min RTT and not the absolute min RTT to get a more meaningful sample size
- Track metrics as distributions and not gauges for better visibility
- Capture data from sample window in a single immutable class
- Fix Vegas smoothing
- Fix Vegas smoothing and set default to 1.0
- Fix partitionByPathInfo

- Better tracking of RTT noLoad
- For the 'gradient' limiter allow for probing for an up to date noload RTT
- Less aggressive min rtt threshold of (1 us) now that we can probe for better RTT
- Make the sample window size relative to the last min RTT and not the absolute min RTT to get a more meaningful sample size
- Track metrics as distributions and not gauges for better visibility
- Capture data from sample window in a single immutable class
- Fix Vegas smoothing
- Fix Vegas smoothing and set default to 1.0
- Fix partitionByPathInfo

name: Better tracking of RTT noLoad
body:
- For the 'gradient' limiter allow for probing for an up to date noload RTT
- Less aggressive min rtt threshold of (1 us) now that we can probe for better RTT
- Make the sample window size relative to the last min RTT and not the absolute min RTT to get a more meaningful sample size
- Track metrics as distributions and not gauges for better visibility

name: Capture data from sample window in a single immutable class

body:
- Guages for min_window_rtt and queue_size
- rtt change tolerance configuration

name: Speed up gradient convergence to the limit
Speed up gradient convergence to the limit
Improve Vegas algorithm rate of convergence
Tolerance level for min rtt changes
Initial Release
body: The initial release of core concurrency limit library with integrations for GRPC, Servlet Filter, and Executor.

name: Initial Release
body: The initial release of core concurrency limit library with integrations for GRPC, Servlet Filter, and Executor.
